#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long dp[1000001]={0};
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int n,i,j,k,x;
	long long ans,d,t;
	dp[3]=0,dp[4]=1,dp[5]=3;
	for(i=6;i<=1000001;i++)
	{
		//count=0;
		d=i-3;
		//count=d;
		if(d%2==0)
		{
			 t=d/2;
			 ans=t*(t+1);
		}
		else
		{
			t=d/2;
			ans=(d*(d+1)/2)-(t*(t+1));
		}
		/*for(x=2;;x+=2)
			{
				if(d-x<=0)
					break;
				else
					count+=d-x;
			}  */
		dp[i]=ans+dp[i-1];
	}
	cin>>n;
	while(n!=0)
	{
		cout<<dp[n]<<endl;
		cin>>n;
	}
	return 0;
}
